protocols

	
	
	
objectives

	
		[ ] prevent all outbound traffic
				
				table inet filter {
					chain output {
						type filter hook output priority 0;
						policy drop;
					}
				}
					
	
	
kinds

		
HTTP

			#
			#	permit:
			#		TCP (thusly HTTP) on 80
			#
			tcp dport 80 accept
		
		
		
HTTPS

			#
			#	permit:
			#		TCP (thusly HTTPs) on 443
			#
			tcp dport 443 accept
		
		
		
SSH

		
		
		
TCP



		
UDP
